name: Merchant's bay intersection
description: To the west lies the imposing cargo door for the merchants bay, rusted shut for ages it's also been welded shut for good measure, and its hydraulics are all but gone having been looted long ago.
Merchants bay continue to the east.
To the north is the 'spacewalkway' leading to middle-income housing section.
To the south you can hear the usual rumbling of engines as ships enter and leave the docking area.

name: Merchant's bay-way
description: A long corridor used in the past by automated cargo drones, its been taken over by the station's denizens, the small service bays have been repurposed into store fronts and as much floor space as possible is taken by small vendors.
Teeming with people of all kinds, it's quite hard to make your way trough, finding someone in this crowded place seems impossible
